author: Stretch
content: Piffle! If you are going to do “Retro” do it properly. Dust off McKay’s and Hood’s plans and have a race from Hong Kong to London or NYC to San Francisco via The Horn in ship rigged clippers. I’m talking Flying Cloud vs. Thermopylae here.

author: Doug Bostrom
content: At last, a race that won’t leave us old codgers rattling our newspapers and blowing out our mustaches. If the boats were required to tow a string of barrels behind them, the race would be even better.
